trans-unit.source: Provides data for callbacks that are invoked when a XAML writer sets a value using a type converter call.
trans-unit.target: 提供 XAML 寫入器設定值，這個值使用類型轉換器呼叫時叫用的回呼的資料。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks for type converter usages use the <xref:System.EventHandler%601> delegate, with XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs event data constraint.
trans-unit.target: 類型轉換器使用方式使用的回呼<xref:System.EventHandler%601>XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs 事件資料的條件約束的委派。</xref:System.EventHandler%601>

trans-unit.source: Callbacks for type converter usages are referenced by <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute> applied at the class level (for example on <xref:System.Windows.Setter> class in WPF).
trans-unit.target: 所參考的類型轉換器的使用方式的回呼<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute>套用在類別層級 (例如在<xref:System.Windows.Setter>WPF 中的類別)。</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker> might also reference a callback through the <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker.SetTypeConverterHandler%2A>value.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker>也可能會參考透過回呼<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker.SetTypeConverterHandler%2A>值。</xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker.SetTypeConverterHandler%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: XAML type system / schema information for the member being set.
trans-unit.target: XAML 類型系統所設定之成員的結構描述資訊。

trans-unit.source: The specific type converter instance being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 所叫用特定類型轉換器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value to provide for the member being set.
trans-unit.target: 要提供給所設定之成員的值。

trans-unit.source: Service provider information that can be used by the `typeConverter` class.
trans-unit.target: 服務提供者資訊，可供`typeConverter`類別。

trans-unit.source: Culture information that can be used by the `typeConverter` class when calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom*> and other methods.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性資訊，可供`typeConverter`類別呼叫時<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom*>和其他方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom*>

trans-unit.source: Provides a way to invoke a callback as defined on a base class of the current acting type.
trans-unit.target: 提供所定義之目前類型的基底類別上叫用回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> information that can be used by the type converter class when calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom*> and other methods.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>可以在呼叫時使用的類型轉換器類別資訊<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom*>和其他方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Culture information that can be used by the type converter class
trans-unit.target: 可以類型轉換器類別所使用的文化特性資訊

trans-unit.source: Gets <xref:System.IServiceProvider> information that can be used by the type converter class.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.IServiceProvider>的資訊，可以由型別轉換子類別。</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Service provider information that can be used by the typeConverter class.
trans-unit.target: 服務提供者資訊，可供 typeConverter 類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> instance that is invoked and provides type conversion behavior.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref>叫用，並提供類型轉換行為的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The type converter that provides type conversion behavior.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換行為型別轉換子。
